#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int start;
int josephus(int n , int k){

if(n==1) return 1;

else

return (josephus(n-1,k+start)+k-1)%n + 1 ;
}

int main(){
    int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--){
int n,m;
scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
start=m;
printf("%d\n",josephus(n,m));
}
return 0;
}
